Reviews.Title: “Exactly what we wanted!”
Reviews.Author: yorkierose14
Reviews.Content: Location, location, location..... Planning our 3 day stay meant taking the area into consideration and previous reports led us to this hotel. Great choice and we will return on a future trip. Centrally located and very, very safe for all of the touristy bits but alongside that the indepth knowledge and snippets shared by the staff about where to visit and where to eat - priceless! Excellent bars, restaurants and shops in the area and very good value when you ask the hotel for assistance with your plans. Breakfast just right to start the day before setting off to explore. If you want a chinzy hotel with lots of public spaces, a dining room etc to socilaise with other guests, then Hotel de Monti is not for you - better pay double the rate and get another hotel to suit your needs. If you're after a taste of the local scene in Rome with a spotless room and extraordinary local insights then this is the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Clean & tidy but overpriced”
Reviews.Author: JulesandDunc
Reviews.Content: From the website photos and reviews I found here, I was expecting a little more. Unfotunately this is not a quaint boutique hotel but a series of rooms on the third floor of an apartment building. Yes there are no signs so locating it is a bit of a challenge. The room was clean but a lot smaller than expected. In my opinion the room was overpriced for its size, location and amenities. Also beware if your on the road side of the hotel the traffic noise will be bad due to the cobbled stone road.

Reviews.Title: “A gem”
Reviews.Author: awbenney
Reviews.Content: Okay - it's 3rd floor & no elevator, but you need to have good legs for Rome anyway. This is a great hotel, shiny clean, modern. The people are friendly, helpful, funny & of course multilingual. Even the room we had on the street was quiet. Stay here before the prices go up!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, welcoming and good location”
Reviews.Author: Iluvcyprus_7
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 2 nights, I booked mainly due to the price and location, and wasn't expecting too much, whilst I can't say was luxurious, the hotel was spotless clean, in a fantastic location and I cant rate the staff enough. I was initially concerned as our taxi couldn't find the hotel and it is difficult to find initially, but once found ( the man on reception came out onto the street after taxi driver called him), I was impressed, staff were very friendly, gave us invaluable advice on where to go to avoid queues, recommended excellent (and reasonable) restaurants to eat etc, and generally made our short stay very enjoyable. It is a 5-10 min walk from Palatine Hill, Forum, Colleseum etc, 10-15 toTrevi Fountain, about 20-25 mins to Panthenon, and probably about 40-50 min (leisurely stroll) to Vatican, so if reasonably fit no need for taxi/public transport. The room was simply furnished, and breakfast was brought to your room in a morning on a tray (toast croissants/yoghurt, coffee etc), there are no communal areas such as breakfast room or bar etc, so if these are the things you want from a hotel, then this is not for you, but if you want a clean, welcoming and friendly place (with comfortable beds) to rest your head after walking around the city, then I can't recommend Hotel de Monti enough.

Reviews.Title: “First night in Italy”
Reviews.Author: jjwc
Reviews.Content: We stayed here based on trip advisor reviews and were absolutely delighted. The owner, Alessandro, was fantastic and we had a wonderful first evening in Rome! He had lots of tips and recs for Rome which we happily tried...will definitely go again on our return to Rome. Thanks for a wonderful visit!

Reviews.Title: “Perfection in Rome”
Reviews.Author: love2travel98087
Reviews.Content: Hotel de Monti is absolutely perfect for sightseeing Rome!! From the hotel we went a different direction each day and were able to walk to all major site-seeing attractions quickly. We stayed in Room 35 which was very clean, quiet, and larger than I thought it was going to be for a European room. We chose what we wanted for breakfast each night, slipped it in the box, and it was brought to our room each morning exactly on time. The hotel does not have a elevator, but it did not bother us at all, got to work off all that wonderful food somehow! :) Alessandro (owner) & his Colleague were SO incredibly helpful!! They are prompt in responding to emails, very professional and helped us plan our exploring with tons of local tips/tricks! The hotel is off the main street which we liked, we felt more than safe walking around until the early morning hours. Hotel de Monti is a must stay when coming to Rome - It was everything we expected and more!!! Thanks for a wonderful vacation Jessica & Jayson

Reviews.Title: “Perfect haven”
Reviews.Author: Helen W
Reviews.Content: What can we say about the Hotel de Monti - wonderful location, lovely rooms and warm, genuine service. Alessandro enabled us to fit so much in, by giving us useful tips and wonderful recommendations. Working in tourism ourselves it is a joy to find such a little gem. Thanks to all the staff - we will be back one day. Helen & Richard Feb 2011

Reviews.Title: “A pearl in Rione Monti”
Reviews.Author: Madside
Reviews.Content: Hotel de Monti is a very special hotel. From the outside it is actually impossible to see it’s a hotel. But once you get to the third floor a small reception and the owner Alessandro meets you with a smile. And from there it is a fantastic experience all the way through. The rooms are spacious, clean and recently renovated. The continental breakfast with fresh local ingredients is served in the room at your own requested time and Alessandro is always up-to-date with kind advice about interesting sites and great restaurants nearby. The hotel is located in the Rione Monti district which is a very cosy, friendly and central neighborhood with many bars, restaurants and small shops. We can highly recommend Hotel de Monti which we will certainly visit again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “More than you ever dreamed!”
Reviews.Author: lara_koussaife
Reviews.Content: At Hotel De Monti you will discover Roma as no one else will! The Hotel is very clean, Spacious (scarce currency in Rome) in a very safe and easy reachable area.Italian Breakfast served in the room (yummy Cappuccino) Alessandro the owner, will tip you with all the useful informations and will grant you a memorable stay in a very unique Roman way. For the first time I have not been trapped as a tourist, He has recommended the best places and Roman Restaurant in every corner of the city, and even after leaving the Hotel De Monti, Alessandro has continued provide a very useful links.

Reviews.Title: “Our fantastic holiday”
Reviews.Author: DinaAndrey
Reviews.Content: We've chosen Hotel de Monti for our romantic holiday. It's hard to imagine so quiet place in the very heart of Roma. Most of historical places are very close to the hotel. The first impression was that the hotel is made with love. Very clean, modern and comfortable room, stylish furniture and all these in very old building. The breakfast was very tasty, different kinds of coffee, tea, toast, ham, cheese, yogurt and others. And it was served in our room at the time we want. Allessandro gave us very useful advises where to eat and what to see. Restaurants, recommended were perfect as well as pizzerias . Tante grazie, Allessandro, di nostri Vacanze Romane!

Reviews.Title: “Probably one of the best places to stay in Rome (The Everlasting City)”
Reviews.Author: dZoniiiii
Reviews.Content: Me and my girlfriend booked a room in this Hotel since it was had really good review and mark on booking.com. You cannot see everything on the Internet so we were pretty suprised when we arrived to Via Panisperna and saw the front door of the building which are a ruin! When we got into the Hotel everything changed. Staff was very friendly, rooms and holes clean and nicely equipped. We instantly got some good advices about wondering around in Rome, places that must be seen and what is the way to see places in this magical city. Guys working in Hotel are very knowledgeable and I mean very very knowledgeable! We spent most of time with Alessandro who speak 5+ languages perfectly and has really solid knowledge lots of europe country cultures. Really great guy! We were told where to eat, what Italian foot we should try, what is the easiest way to enter museums and other places and how Rome should be seen and visited. In general, this was one very nice experience and I would recommend everyone visiting Rome for the first time to stay in this Hotel. It just cannot be mistake! Must say at the end that location is really perfect!! This place is very near to everything!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and lovely staff!”
Reviews.Author: Samantha P
Reviews.Content: I booked here as a surprise for my fiance for his 30th birthday and it did not disappoint. The staff are very friendly and helpful and very knowledgable. They can tell you the best places to go and how to beat the queues! The accomodation itself is very comfortable and exactly what we were hoping for. When we visited we walked everywhere as the hotel is so well located! only 5-10mins from the Colosseum (my main reason for booking at the time) and perhaps 15-20 to the Spanish steps. There are also some lovely places to eat nearby as well, especially La Mela D'Oro on nearby Via Santa Maria Maggiore! The room was very comfortable and well equipped and kept immaculate by the housekeeper! All in all it was exactly what we were looking for and I would definately recommend this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay anywhere else”
Reviews.Author: ClareandAmanda
Reviews.Content: Hotel De Monti is perfectly located for everything and anything you might want to see in Rome. Alessandro and his team are knowledgeable and genuine people, who's only interest is that you have a good time. From recommending excellent local restaurants and how to beat the queues at the Vatican to where to find the best of Romes contemporary street art, Alessandro advised us on everything we asked of him, and all with a smile. We will definitely be returning to Rome and staying at Hotel De Monti. Couldn't rate it more highly.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very clean and friendly”
Reviews.Author: Anton Y
Reviews.Content: It was our first time in Rome and we enjoyed it very much. We have landed in Fiumicino airport at night and hotel staff arranged taxi and late check-in for us readily. Next day we could reach Colosseum and Palatine in just a 15 minutes walk, thanks to a hotel great location. The room was not large but perfectly freshly renovated, clean, cozy and all furniture was new. It has safe box, modern LCD TV and free Wi-Fi. Alessandro (general manager) was very helpful telling us brilliant city "shortcuts" saving our time and providing perfect impressions. There is a metro station Cavour in a 5 mins walk, Termini central station in a 15 mins walk and beautiful Santa Maria Maggiore (one of the four Rome's major basilicas) in a 5 mins walk down the street. Also you can reach Via Nazionale (one of the city major streets) in 5-10 mins walk to catch a bus to San Pietro and Vatican or do some shopping. A number of osterias, trattorias and small food shops are in a close vicinity. We had a great stay. Would recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: Krista N
Reviews.Content: Hotel de Monti was the best hotel I have ever stayed in. The rooms were clean, breakfast served right in your room was great, and the location makes your stay in Rome very convenient - you can reach the hotel from Termini station in just few steps, while city centre and the main sights are just few minutes away. The area is very safe and quiet, making this a great place to rest after a long day in this wonderful city. Not to forget the comfortable pillows - not the usual type of hotel pillows, they are really big, loved it!!! Our visit in Rome was just marvellous thanks to the hotel owner - he told us where to go, what to see, where to eat, and we were able to experience the Eternal city from a completely different point of view. We drunk the best cappucino, ate the best Tiramisu and spaghettis in the whole Rome, following his suggestion! We even found the highest place in the city where to drink champagne and enjoy this wonderful city! We couldn`t ask for more, and we will definetely stay here when in Rome again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, cosy, clean and very friendly”
Reviews.Author: MugEsen
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed 1 night at Hotel de Monti and evrything was great! As soon as we made our reservation they sent us an e-mail including everything we might need. The 7 room hotel is on the 3rd floor of and old building. They are very helpful with your luggage. Breakfast is served in your according to your choices at the time you ordered. The choices are not much wide (coffe varieties, tea, orange juice, toasted bread, cruassaint, grandma cookies, jam, nutella, yogurt and cheese) but delicious. The rooms are medium sized, very clean and brand new. In the middle of town center but no noise at all. You can leave your luggage after check out if you have more time left. The places they offer for lunch, dinner, suvenier shopping are also great. You feel like an Italian not like a tourist with the help and confidence they gave. So Hotel de Monti definitely deserves the money you paid.

Reviews.Title: “City Tour”
Reviews.Author: Puma1893
Reviews.Content: The hotel doesn't look very promising from the outside, but it surprises you defenetely after you have made the check in. You won't find a hotel sign at all. The hotel is only mentioned at the bell signs. The owner himslef does recommend sightseeing spots, restaurants, tells you do's and dont's in Rome. He is also available for conversations in any directions. The room does surprise you too; very comfortabel, clean and for planned city tour the right choice. The 'local' breakfast is served to the room and ist tasting very well.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service Prior to Arrival”
Reviews.Author: Haran A
Reviews.Content: The Hotel De Monti came highly recommended by my friends. I emailed the hotel to inquire about additional services since I was going to Rome on my Honeymoon. The staff replied to my email within 5 minutes and answered all of my questions. It is probably the best priced hotel that provides a larger new room. They also deliver breakfast to your room, so you can stay in bed a little longer in the morning. Since my stay was for 6 days and I was on my honeymoon, they threw in a complimentary bottle of wine. I am amazed by their service and I look forward to meeting the staff in November. I will write another review when I return from my Honeymoon.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: triticumman
Reviews.Content: Quiet and lovely hotel, clean and confortable. It has no elevator but it's absolutely recomendable. Hope to come back some day :)

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC”
Reviews.Author: Dorota W
Reviews.Content: New hotel in great location. Superb and comfortable rooms in good price. Had an excellent time and highly recommend this hotel to anyone to stay in for their trip to Rome.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely place from lovely Rome.......”
Reviews.Author: EnginEVSEN
Reviews.Content: Very lovely and nice hotel from italy.i have a nice holiday and i like it very much .Helpful staff and central location.Hotel rooms and breakfast are beaitiful and nice for me .i can reccomend this hotel highly.i have a very nice experience...

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel De Monti
HotelInfo.Address: Via Panisperna 95, 00184 Rome, Italy
